title: BLOOD MOON DIANA.
body:
Aside from just forgetting she exists it'd be cool if Diana didn't miss out literally her entire character theme when it comes to new skins rolling out. But nah give it to Yasuo. 

Edit: Blood moon is apparently nothing to do with anything Lunari and as usual I'm full of shit.

No but seriously more skins for princess car crash pleaseeee.

"A new spoon is Frightening" - Diana on kitchen cutlery.

replies.body:
The Blood Moon lore is relevant to Ionia's legends/perceptions of the Shadow Isles. Diana is from neither The Shadow Isles or Ionia, so unless Riot decides to throw the whole BM lore out the window I highly doubt Diana will be getting a BM skin. That said, she may get something similar.

I agree it'd be a cool skin on her, but there's more to  the skin themes than just looks, they all have their own lore.
BLOOD MOON DIANA IS A THING NOW I WAS RIGHT :D

I am very surprised indeed! I suppose Diana seems like someone who might be interested in Ionian legends, and the skin certainly doesn't feel out of place on her, so I'm happy with that :) I just didn't think it would happen :P

Oh.. wow, that pours so much cold water on the fire. Thanks for filling me in though ^_^

I should check my lore before I start bitching next time :P
Sorry good friend :( but there are plenty of cool skins in Diana's future I'm sure. I love her skins and I don't even play her :( Own them anyway though, I have a problem.

Since the lore is based on Ionian culture, maybe she could get a spin-off skin called Moon of Blood Diana!

Spoilers: It's a red version of her outfit.

... what the hell are you on, riot has being designing firestorm diana or whatever it is for past 6 or so months

"A new bafoon is rising"

Well I'm usually on a mix of crack cocaine and some crushed up chimes that bard gave me.

Also where's the info on firestorm, that sounds really cool?
